regions.name: bayarea
regions.motd: We now have operator email addresses for about 75% of the pinball machines in the Bay Area.  So when writing machine condition notes, remember that a wonderful person will get an email with the comments tomorrow.  Please be friendly!

regions.name: uk
regions.motd: To help keep Pinball Map running, consider a donation! https://pinballmap.com/donate

regions.name: pittsburgh
regions.motd: Check the Events page for tournaments and leagues! Open and women's leagues start in September. https://www.pinballmap.com/pittsburgh/events

regions.name: delaware
regions.motd: Welcome silverball enthusiasts to the Delaware region for Pinball Map! Please help add/update machines and locations. Help keep pinball alive in Delaware! Please LIKE and Follow First State Flippers on FB at https://www.facebook.com/1ststateflippers/

regions.name: finland
regions.motd:
For pinball discussions (mostly in Finnish) head over to the Finnish pinball hub http://flipperit.net/.
Consider also joining the association for Finnish pinball players FLIPP: http://www.flipp.fi/.
